alert.note: Alert for Chukchi Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 01 at 3:13PM AKDT until April 02 at 12:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility occuring. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting to 40 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...Chukchi Sea Coast. * WHEN...Until noon AKDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Low visibility in snow and blowing snow is occuring from Kivalina to Point Hope this afternoon. Those conditions will improve this evening as winds decrease there. Low visibility in snow and blowing snow will develop tonight at Shishmaref as northwest winds increase there, and those conditions will improve late Sunday morning as winds decrease.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
